data.text:
As far as films go, Robert likes:

2001 a space oddysey*taxi driver*raging bull*raiders trilogy!*baron munchausen*time bandits*brazil*blade runner*aguirre wrath of god*fitzcarraldo*t1 & t2*apocalypse now*the deer hunter*angel heart*name of the rose*leon*scarface*nikita*fatal attraction*easy rider*et*dirty rotten scoundrels*sir henry at rawlinson end*nuts in may*abigails party*breakfast at tiffany's*the meaning of life*life of brian*monty python and the holy grail*king of comedy*dumb and dumber*my life as a dog*withnail and i*clockwise*dumbo*cinderella*sleeping beauty*alice in wonderland*peter pan*beauty and the beast*jungle book*snow white*101 dalmations*toy story*who's afraid of virginia woolf?*whatever happened to baby jane?*cleopatra*one flew over the cuckoo's nest*jfk*dead poets society*gone with the wind*on the black hill*the night the prowler*the trial*a place in the sun*under milk wood*tess*lolita (kubrick)*trainspotting*10 rillington place*little dorrit*the city of lost children*re-animator*house of the long shadows*bad timing*niagara*gentlemen prefer blondes*the seven year itch*the sound of music*mary poppins*oliver*yellow submarine*star wars trilogy*alien*altered states*orphee*la belle et la bete*eraserhead*the wicker man*repulsion*the tenant*performance*polyester*female trouble*pink flamingos*freaks*videodrome*clockwork orange*reservoir dogs*pulp fiction*paris texas*repo man*blood simple*the big lebowski*grey gardens
